1370: Gerrit moved to Davids hof.B.6 after marriage.
Got married to Wijfgode at age 30 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Wijfgode, Geraldus, at age 31.
1372: Had a son with Wijfgode, Gerrit, at age 32.
1373: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Erkenradis, at age 33.
1376: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Baua, at age 36.
1377: Had a son with Wijfgode, Ghisele, at age 37.
1378: Had a son with Wijfgode, Veder, at age 38.
1380: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Rabburgis, at age 40.
